Detailed Description

Class to performs basic operations on time series.

TS::ts_simple_linear_regression ( $  descriptor  ) 

Calculate the linear regression coefficients alfa and beta.

Parameters:
$descriptor Array of the independent variables Xt (see note)
Note:
Yt = alfa * Xt + beta
Returns:
array($alfa, $beta)

TS::ts_smoothing_simple ( $  alfa = 0.5,
$  Szero = null,
$  init_periods = 0 
)

Calculate the simple exponential smoothing forecast.

Parameters:
$alfa Smoothing parameter
$Szero Initializing value for S
$init_periods Number of periods to be used to initialize S
Note:
The forecast for the period t+1 is calculated as
Ft+1 = St
St = alfa * At + (1-alfa)*St-1

TS::ts_smoothing_trend ( $  alfa = 0.5,
$  beta = 0.5,
$  Szero = null,
$  Tzero = null,
$  init_periods = 0 
)

Calculate the exponential smoothing forecast with trend.

Parameters:
$alfa Smoothing parameter
$beta Trend parameter
$Szero Initializing value for S
$Tzero Initializing value for T
$init_periods Number of periods to be used to initialize S
Note:
The forecast for the period t+1 is calculated as
Ft+1 = St +Tt
St = alfa * At + (1-alfa)*(St-1 * Tt-1)
Tt = beta * (St - St-1) + (1-beta)*Tt-1

TS::ts_var ( $  type = "pop"  ) 

Calculate the variance of the time series.

Parameters:
$type (To BE DONE)

TS::ts_weighted_mean ( $  weights = array()  ) 

Calculate the weighted mean of the time series.

Parameters:
$weights The weights to be used
Returns:
The weighted mean of the time series
